Load Data
Main Success Scenario:
  1. Real-time or batch via REST API
Alternatives:
  1a. Want to use Reltio GUI
    1a1. Use Reltio Console capabilities
  1b. Want to integrate with an ETL. 
    1b1. Use ETL tool with REST adapter
  1c. Want to integrate with a Java method of doing this
    1c1. Use Relatio Java utilities
